p: To determine CAT activity (EC 1.11.1.6), the method described by Chance and Maehly (1995) was used with the following modifications. Degradation of H 2O 2 in a reaction medium containing 300 μM tris buffer (pH 7.5), 100 μM H 2O 2 and 1 ml of plant extract mixed in an ice bath was monitored at 240 nm for 2 min. The same reaction medium free of plant extract was used as a blank.
